pageContext.claim: “On 245  occasions, former FBI Director James Comey told House investigators he didn't know, didn't recall, or couldn’t remember things when asked. Opened investigations on 4 Americans (not 2) - didn't know who signed off and didn't know Christopher Steele. All lies!”
pageContext.analysis: There's no evidence to suggest that Comey' testimony, which was under oath, was in any way false.
